title: The Herd Saturday Special Podcast: 08/25/2018
itunes:title: The Herd Saturday Special Podcast: 08/25/2018
description:
Colin talks with CBS College Football Analyst and former FSU QB Danny Kanell about the Urban Meyer situation, the South being too dominant and is USC Head Coach Clay Helton is on the hot seat in this exclusive podcast.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
